EmailTemplate.subject: Redesign your patient delivery with virtual nursing programs
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WHITE PAPER Inpatient Virtual Nursing Fundamentals, Uses and Benefits Hospitals and health systems today are facing serious nursing staffing challenges, but virtual nursing solutions may be uniquely positioned to solve significant pain points like these. Our recent white paper introduces the practice of inpatient virtual nursing, provides an overview of its benefits and emerging use cases, and offers guidance on introducing the practice in a way that fosters adoption and acceptance among staff.
